entry.title: @Charley makefile
entry.content:
多文件工程. test.cpp [main所在] func.h func.cpp

target = main
objects = test.o func.o
sources = test.cpp func.cpp

$(target):$(objects)
    g++ -o $(target) $(objects)

$(objects):$(sources)
    g++ -c $(sources)

.PHONY:clean
clean:
    rm -rf $(objects) $(target)

然后在终端下

make
#清理
#make clean

就可以了
